message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and value, it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your appreciation for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while allowing you to secure it at a reasonable premium. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
